content:
Offboarding Checklist for IT Employee

Company: UX is Fine!

Date: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Employee Name: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Position: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

1. Adobe Creative Cloud
* Transfer ownership of all Adobe Creative Cloud files to a designated colleague
* Remove the employee's access to all Adobe Creative Cloud teams
* Remove the employee's Adobe Creative Cloud account
2. Discord
* Remove the employee's access to all Discord channels
* Remove the employee's Discord account
3. Dropbox
* Transfer ownership of all Dropbox files to a designated colleague
* Remove the employee's access to all Dropbox teams
* Remove the employee's Dropbox account
4. Google Workspaces
* Transfer ownership of all Google Drive files to a designated colleague
* Remove the employee's access to all Google Workspaces
* Delete the employee's Google account
* Update Google Groups to reflect the employee's departure
5. HR Apps
* Update HR apps to reflect the employee's departure
* Remove the employee's access to all HR apps
6. 1Password
* Remove the employee's access to all 1Password teams
* Remove the employee's 1Password account
7. Payroll Apps
* Update payroll apps to reflect the employee's departure
* Remove the employee's access to all payroll apps
8. Slack
* Remove the employee's access to all Slack channels
* Remove the employee's Slack account
9. Wizer Security Awareness Training
* Remove the employee's access to Wizer Security Awareness Training
* Update the training records to reflect the employee's departure
10. Other IT Assets
* Disable the employee's computer access
* Collect all company equipment, such as laptops, phones, and other devices
* Update all security protocols and access controls to reflect the employee's departure
11. Sign-Off
Employee Signature: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
Offboarding Manager Signature: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Note: This checklist is subject to change based on the company's needs and requirements. The above mentioned items may not cover all necessary offboarding tasks, and the company may add or remove items as needed.
